text: The Ronald and Nancy Reagan Research Institute, an affiliate of the National Alzheimer's Association in Chicago, Illinois, is an initiative founded by former United States President Ronald Reagan and First Lady Nancy Reagan to accelerate the progress of Alzheimer's disease research. The center was dedicated in 1995. ==References== Category:1995 establishments in Illinois Category:Buildings and structures in Chicago Category:Nancy Reagan Category:Things named after Ronald Reagan
title: Ronald and Nancy Reagan Research Institute
